commandDescription: Splits permissionsets into various csv files
sfXmlFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input permissionsets. Default: '%s'
esCsvFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for output permissionsets. Default: '%s'
inputFlagDescription: Specify a permissionset file in input. Example: MyPermissionSet
sortFlagDescription: Specify if split results must be sorted. Default '%s'
